name: dunked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
dunk
dunk verb [T]
(INTO LIQUID)
to put a biscuit, piece of bread, etc. into a liquid such as tea, coffee, or soup for a short time before eating it: She dunked a biscuit in her coffee.
informal to put something into liquid for a short time: Dunk the sponge in water every once in a while to stop it from drying out.
